name: toegether
description: ToeGether - Dating app with gesture recognition

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npx serve -s build -l 3001
